fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Target a player. If they die, you may change their full last will, cause of death, and role. You will receive all correct information. You will also steal their ability for one night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: The night after you successfully use your main ability, you cannot use it. You must do nothing or use your stolen ability. If you are the only Loyalist left, aside from the Governor, you may perform the factional kill and use your ability in the same night. You may only do this once.
